DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effectiveness two different dose IMX-150 placebo ( non-active ) treatment diabetic peripheral neuropathy pain foot .
DOC.criteria: Must sufficient command understand English language complete diary questionnaires If female , may pregnant lactate Can treat outpatient basis Has clinical diagnosis Type1 Type II diabetes : confirm diagnosis diabetic distal symmetrical sensorimotor polyneuropathy bilateral pain foot least 3 month . Must hemoglobin A1C value 11 % le stable treatment Agrees use test cream specify 4 week period Willing use medication , include investigational medication , treat pain symptom Diabetic Neuropathy study . Currently use nitrate medication Currently use Viagra® , Levitra® , Cialis® phosphodiesterase 5 inhibitor medication erectile dysfunction Currently treat symptom diabetic neuropathy , include limited Lyrica® , Cymbalta® transcutaneous stimulation Not stable dose least 4 week prior study screen vasodilator require underlying condition Know allergy Nitroglycerin , propylene glycol common moisturize creams History migraine , cluster vascular headache , chronic pain great pain intensity pain diabetic neuropathy chronic pain condition within region diabetic peripheral neuropathy Amputation one toe per foot Neurological disorder skin condition may alter local sensation foot History unstable medical problem , clinically significant screen laboratory test current medical condition would contraindicate administration study mediation , interfere study evaluation , interfere patient 's ability comply study History drug ( include cannabinoid ) alcohol abuse within past year Cognitive language difficulty would impair completion pain assessment tool Within past 3 month , either myocardial infarction , uncontrolled hypotension , uncontrolled hypertension Participated study investigational drug within 4 week 5 halflives drug , whichever longer , prior Screening Major abdominal , thoracic vascular surgery within 6 month first dose study medication Open lesion area cream apply Fertile patient unable unwilling comply contraceptive requirement study period
